greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of lattice paths without interior points from {4}^n to {0}^n using steps that decrement one component by 1.
comment: An interior point p = (p_1, ..., p_n) has n>0 components with 0<p_i<4 for 1<=i<=n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..45
maple: b:= proc(n, l) option remember; local m; m:= nops(l);
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 02 2013
